metadata.title: CVE-2016-7972 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The check_allocations function in libass/ass_shaper.c in libass before0.13.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryallocation failure) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass5 - 0.13.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libass package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
